answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Kasmira,
I am unfortunately unfamiliar with the City of Prescott, AZ's specific hiring policies but you can always check the jobs section of our website (http://icma.org/en/icma/career_network/job_seekers/browse_jobs) and see if they have any entry level jobs available. Additionally you can probably contact that local government's HR department directly for more detailed instructions. I hope this helps! 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Kasmira Dunn
text:
How do I apply for entry level position in the City Of Prescott Az. after the city council votes to bring in ICMA to study fire and police department?
Thank You
Kasmira Dunn
title: Entry Level Position
